name: liturgical
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to (a particular set of) the words, music, and actions used in ceremonies in some religions, especially Christianity: He has taught classes on liturgical worship. Pope Pius V published the liturgical text that would be used to celebrate Mass for the next 400 years. See
liturgy
More examplesFewer examplesA cantor sings or chants liturgical music and leads the congregation in prayer."The Geese Book" is a 500-year-old liturgical manuscript.Mary is revered and praised in liturgical prayer.
